title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin’s Week 4 NFL Reaction
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin’s Week 4 NFL Reaction
description:
Colin gives his instant reaction to the afternoon slate of Week 4 NFL games, including bad big picture signs from the Packers’ OT win over the Pats in Lambeau, if Russell Wilson is washed, what Cooper Rush’s success says about Dak, if the Jets win over the Steelers was a turning point for Robert Saleh, and who’s the best team in the NFL after a month.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
